bibl.title: The Semantics of Showcase in Herodotus's Histories.
Transactions and Proceedings of the American Philological Association

bibl.note: Analyses how Herodotus uses the verbal stem of ἀποδείκνυμι: used absolutely, it describes specialized verbal displays made through enumeration, such as the Egyptian priests' genealogy; such collecting verbally conjures the visual realities of everything Herodotus has seen. - Avec résumé en anglais.
